data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that we have scheduled an Earnings Call with the Analysts / Investors on Wednesday January 28 2026 at 04.00 P.M. (IST) to discuss the unaudited (standalone and consolidated) financial results for the quarter ended December 31 2025 (Q3 Results).

Please find enclosed herewith the earnings call invite for the same.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Consideration Of Un-Audited (Standalone And Consolidated) Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31 2025.
data.news_body: Solarworld Energy Solutions Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 28/01/2026 inter alia to consider and approve Un-Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025 or any other matter with the permission of the Chairperson.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that Board of Directors of the Company in its meeting held on Friday October 17 2025 has approved the Un-Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended June 30 2025. In this regard and pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 47 of the SEBI ( Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we herein enclose the copy of the Newspaper Advertisement dated October 18 2025 published in Financial Express (English Newspaper) and Jansatta (Hindi Newspaper).

You are requested to kindly take the same on your record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
This is in continuation to our letter dated October 14 2025 wherein we had informed about an Earnings Call Scheduled with Analysts / Investors on Friday October 17 2025 at 6:30 P.M. (IST) to discuss the Un-Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30 2025 (Q1). 

Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Part A of Schedule III of the Listing Regulations please note that the audio Link for the said earnings call is available at the website of the Company under the below link:

https://worldsolar.in/earnings-call-audio-recording-q1-fy26/

We request you to kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Solarworld Energy Solutions Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from September 30 2025 the equity shares of Solarworld Energy Solutions Ltd (Scrip Code: 544532) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250929- dated September 29 2025.
